title: 大家寫C++會用到邊啲Programming paradigm

replies.msg:
1.Procedual
2.Lambda Calculus
3.Template metaprogramming
4.Object Oriented Programming

而家我有能力寫到既得1同4
學緊3

oo都唔係好熟
仲未有時間撚嗰堆design pattern

聽講識咗2先會對學其他paradigms大有幫助!

BTW, 原來python個mathplotlib可以直接用LaTeX嚟打equation, 正!
試打樓主個名如下.

euler.py:

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.text(0.1, 0.5, r"$e^{i\pi} + 1 = 0$ (Euler's Equation)", fontsize=40)
plt.show()
exit

聽講識咗2先會對學其他paradigms大有幫助!

BTW, 原來python個mathplotlib可以直接用LaTeX嚟打equation, 正!
試打樓主個名如下.

euler.py:

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.text(0.1, 0.5, r"$e^{i\pi} + 1 = 0$ (Euler's Equation)", fontsize=40)
plt.show()
exit


其實我都唔係好清楚2係乜
淨係聽過下functor, lambda expression之類既野

Lambda Calculus is actually the mathematics of Functional Programming. If you know λ-calculus, you'll have a better understanding of how functions are operating in this paradigm. However, one can still get to grips with functional programming without knowing λ-calculus at all!

template 咪即係oo 既generic type

Lambda Calculus is actually the mathematics of Functional Programming. If you know λ-calculus, you'll have a better understanding of how functions are operating in this paradigm. However, one can still get to grips with functional programming without knowing λ-calculus at all!

平時寫Python都習慣唔到lambda expression既寫法


In IP, all things are memory.
In OOP, all things are objects.
In FL, all things are functions.

Changing from one model to another is like changing the basic unit you need to manipulate. Tinkering with, on a consecutive basis, a specific paradigm for at least 21 days and you'll get used to it!
